## 1. Prepare 

* Find a model folder and take out one working page.  
* Open the data file and find the number of the page.  

> Add the file link here…… 

* Open a blank page and record the same number on both two sides and all other information from the working page to the blank page. 
* Move all samples on side of the working page and place them in the preparation area (a shallow, gridded slab, or a plastic tray) according to their numbers. 
* Check that the sample is clean, could use paper towels to clean the surface.
